item.title: MIUI OS3.0.36.0.WPCCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 17 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 17 China

Codename: pudding

Version: OS3.0.36.0.WPCCNXM | 16.0

Size: 11.0 GB

MD5: 62817b563dbd0822d0411b0644db6b9d

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Standby power consumption in some scenarios
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Accessibility features stopped working in some cases
Fix: Permission issues with Find device in certain situations
[Camera]
Optimization: Image quality for selfies
